overview: Rith's life is turned upside down when his parents insist that he meets the girl they want him to marry. Desperate for freedom, Rith pretends he's already in love with someone else. But his parents demand to meet this 'someone else'. Rith has five days to persuade someone - anyone! - to pose as his girlfriend to trick his parents. At the last moment, he meets a beer girl - Chhaya. Is she the answer to his problem?
title: Price of Love
